rule: If the given word's part of speech can be determined and aligns with one of the part-of-speech tags in the alphabetical list provided, the output must be exactly one of those part-of-speech tags written in uppercase without any additional characters, spaces, or punctuation.
complianceText:
The chatbot output consists of a single part-of-speech tag, which aligns with the instruction to return only the tag. The tag 'NN' is present in the provided list of valid tags within the <DESC>.
OK
